item.title: Hello World
item.author: Author
item.description:
Hello world!

This is my first post on my new created blog.

I’m a Software Engineer that moved countries in a mist of a pandemic. Here i share my ideas, projects and interests. To celebrate i leave my favorite game of all time as a easter egg.
